text:
Nintendo’s Latest Zelda Game Is its Most Quirky in Decades 
Time Saturday 24th October, 2015 
game idea since Kazunobu Shimizu flipped us sideways almost three decades ago in The Adventure of Link. I mean more than the shadow slinking in last year’s...
